about_the_game:
SHARDS

  • 15 Shards

BOOSTS

  • 2x XP for 24 hours

WEAPONS

  • RSASS (Sniper Rifle)
  • Vector (SMG)

CHARACTER ITEMS

  • Combat Knife (Melee Weapon)
  • Recon (Body)
  • Paratrooper (Body)
  • Cap (Headgear)
  • Backwards Cap (Headgear)
  • Boonie (Headgear)
  • Tactical Delta Helmet (Headgear)
  • Delta Medic Helmet (Headgear)
  • Sky Ronin Medic Helmet (Headgear)
  • Spec Ops (Voice)

BONUS

  • Delta Force Supply Cache Player Icon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
